name: Terra Prime
description: Terra Prime is a habitable planet similar to Earth. It has lush green forests, vast oceans, and diverse wildlife.

name: Nova Prime
description: Nova Prime is a massive gas giant with swirling clouds of various colors. It is home to numerous floating cities inhabited by diverse alien species.

name: Asteria
description: Asteria is not a planet but a dense asteroid belt rich in valuable minerals. It serves as a major mining hub for spacefaring civilizations.

name: Atlantis
description: Atlantis is a water-covered planet with small scattered islands. Its underwater cities are home to advanced aquatic civilizations.
